img.p: With 115 years of experience we’ll ensure you always get the best education.

div.p: See what’s happening this week at Forestville USD in our weekly bulletin. This is where you can find out: what’s for lunch, what activities are happening, and who our green ticket winners are.
See what’s happening at Forestville USD in our online Activities Calendar and even download events to your phone, computer or tablet so you never miss an opportunity to be part of the team!
Kid-inspired, chef-crafted. our menu focuses on foods kids love to eat. All of our meals exceed nutrition standards set by the USDA Healthy Hunger Free Kids Act.

div.p: Preparing students for the future
Inspiring creativity and self expression
Creating a life long love of reading
Good for the mind, body and spirit
For a rich and thriving student experience
Music and art is a never ending adventure

div.h2: The Forestville Union School District Mission
div.p: Forestville Elementary School is committed to equipping our students with the tools they need for academic, personal and social success.

We provide opportunities for each student to reach their highest potential by establishing a curriculum that meets or exceeds standards for education; providing supportive programs that develop our children's mental, physical and social skills; and partnering with parents and the community to create an environment geared to the success of our students.

div.p: 8th Grade Parents -- It is time to register your student for High School! Please follow this link for information about registering your child at…

Forestville Academy needs parents and staff to assist with our Valentine's Dance on Friday February 14th! Please follow this link for more information: https://www.forestvilleusd.org/wp-content/uploads/V-Dance-2020-Volunteers.pdf

Forestville School is now hiring for a Chief Business Officer. The application deadline is January 28, 2020 For more information, please follow this link:https://www.forestvilleusd.org/wp-content/uploads/Forestville-USD-CBO-Position-Announcement.pdf
This document repository contains school policies, meeting minutes, agendas, handbooks and much more. Available school governance documentation can be found here!
This library contains all forms needed for application to Meal Programs, After School Care, Preschool, Health Forms and much more.

p.em: Our new website is mobile friendly and ready for use on your phone!

div.p: Get connected with the Forestville activities calendar!

div.p: Forestville School (K-1st) and Academy (2nd-6th) are committed to equipping our students with the tools they need for academic, personal and social achievement. We are committed to moving forward and continuing to pledge our best effort on behalf of your children.

p.a: All Forestville Union School District employment postings are listed on edjoin.org. Click on this text to see current listings.

div.p: "I have never seen such a caring staff at a school. All the students are treated as family. I would recommend this school to anyone."
- Parent
"This school develops strong character in its students like integrity, compassion and respect."
- Parent
6321 Hwy 116, Forestville, CA 95436
@2017 Forestville Union School District

Accessibility Notice: Forestville Union School District is committed to ensuring that its website is accessible to individuals with disabilities. If you experience difficulty accessing any content on our website, please contact Cisco Piazzo at cpiazzo@forestvilleusd.org or 707-887-2279 to request the information in an alternate format, or to provide feedback on how FUSD can improve its website accessibility.
